sn22.18:1.3: The cause and condition that gives rise to form is also impermanent.
sn22.18:1.4: Since form is produced by what is impermanent, how could it be permanent?
sn22.18:1.13: The cause and condition that gives rise to consciousness is also impermanent.
sn22.18:1.14: Since consciousness is produced by what is impermanent, how could it be permanent?
sn22.18:1.16: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
